title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt and selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu...
EB: All the open editors should be closed, including the file f1.txt.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, please follow these steps:
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file f1.txt.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
